meanings.definition: Not making or showing unfair or prejudiced distinctions.
meanings.sent1: The school has a nondiscriminatory policy that ensures all students are treated fairly.
meanings.sent2: It is important for companies to have a nondiscriminatory hiring process to promote equality.
meanings.sent3: The nondiscriminatory approach to selecting team captains led to a surprising mix of players.
meanings.sent4: Her nondiscriminatory attitude towards different art styles opened up new creative possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The nondiscriminatory treatment of all animals at the shelter touched the hearts of many volunteers.

meanings.definition: Treating all people or things equally.
meanings.sent1: A nondiscriminatory approach to distributing resources ensures fairness for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The nondiscriminatory allocation of tasks among team members promotes teamwork.
meanings.sent3: The nondiscriminatory division of snacks at the party surprised the guests.
meanings.sent4: His nondiscriminatory support for all sports teams made him a popular coach.
meanings.sent5: The nondiscriminatory treatment of all students by the teacher created a positive learning environment.
